mapper.update:
update t_IrrBRStadia
Stadia_Name = #{stadiaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Stadia_Type = #{stadiaType,jdbcType=CHAR},
LOC_CODE = #{locCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
WaterDam_D = #{waterdamD,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
STBK = #{stbk,jdbcType=CHAR},
FLOW_DIR = #{flowDir,jdbcType=CHAR},
DAT_TP = #{datTp,jdbcType=CHAR},
DAT_ELEV = #{datElev,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
MOD_BAS_VAL = #{modBasVal,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
MOD_PARA = #{modPara,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
EST_ST_YM = #{estStYm,jdbcType=CHAR},
RUN_COND = #{runCond,jdbcType=CHAR},
ENG_MAN_CD = #{engManCd,jdbcType=CHAR},
Time_Sign = #{timeSign,jdbcType=TIME},
Remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where stadiaCode = #{stadiacode,jdbcType=CHAR}

update t_IrrBRStadia set Stadia_Name = #{stadiaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Stadia_Type = #{stadiaType,jdbcType=CHAR}, LOC_CODE = #{locCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, WaterDam_D = #{waterdamD,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, STBK = #{stbk,jdbcType=CHAR}, FLOW_DIR = #{flowDir,jdbcType=CHAR}, DAT_TP = #{datTp,jdbcType=CHAR}, DAT_ELEV = #{datElev,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, MOD_BAS_VAL = #{modBasVal,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, MOD_PARA = #{modPara,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, EST_ST_YM = #{estStYm,jdbcType=CHAR}, RUN_COND = #{runCond,jdbcType=CHAR}, ENG_MAN_CD = #{engManCd,jdbcType=CHAR}, Time_Sign = #{timeSign,jdbcType=TIME}, Remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where stadiaCode = #{stadiacode,jdbcType=CHAR}
